title: Several Los Angeles Cemeteries
name: Several Los Angeles Cemeteries
description:
A Map by Wildgift

Cities of the dead.

properties.name: Beth Israel Cemetery
properties.description: Posted by WildgiftJewish Cemetery

properties.name: Calvary Cemetery
properties.description: Posted by WildgiftRoman Catholic Cemetery, operated by the Archdiocese.

properties.name: Chinese Cemetery
properties.description: Posted by WildgiftThis cemetery was founded in 1922, according ot the linked article.

properties.name: Chinese Potters Field
properties.description: Posted by WildgiftIn 2006, the MTA unearthed a "potter\'s field" or poor-person\'s cemetery, near Evergreen. The probable location of this cemetery was known for a long time, but the MTA didn\'t follow up on comments to the EIR about it. Consequently, during excavation for the Gold Line extension, these bodies were unearthed. For more information see this story: http://www.chssc.org/MTAChineseGraves.html

properties.name: Eden Memorial Park
properties.description: Posted by Gravedigger1

properties.name: Evergreen Cemetery
properties.description: Posted by WildgiftEvergreen is the oldest cemetery in the City of Los Angeles. Presently, it is mostly a Japanese American institution, but there are people of all races and creeds buried here. See also: http://www.chssc.org/history/shrinefull.html

properties.name: Forest Lawn Cemetery
properties.description: Posted by Wildgift A very large cemetery, aka "memorial park", with several notable buildings.

properties.name: Hollywood Forever Cemetary
properties.description: Posted by Hundredflowers 6000 Santa Monica Blvd., los angeles, caLos Angeles goths have long known Hollywood Forever as the final resting place of Rozz Williams of Christian Death. You will also find luminaries like Johnny Ramone, Rudoph Valentino, Douglas Fairbanks and thousands of actors and hollywood fixtures. In the summer they do an outdoor movie series that is really popular but I don\'t know the name.

properties.name: Rose Hills
properties.description: Posted by WildgiftThe cemetery that advertises itself with a red neon sign reading ROSE HILLS, visible for miles. It\'s like the HOLLYWOOD or the JESUS SAVES sign, except for the dead.

properties.name: Russian Cemetery
properties.description: Posted by WildgiftI don\'t know much about this, but check this out: http://www.lalc.k12.ca.us/access/people/molokans/
